DOC.brief_summary: This study compare efficacy safety generic butoconazole nitrate vaginal cream , 2 % Gynazole-1 ( butoconazole nitrate ) Vaginal Cream , 2 % treatment vulvovaginal candidiasis cause Candida specie .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Study Evaluating Therapeutic Equivalence Two Butoconazole Nitrate Vaginal Cream , 2 % Formulations
DOC.criteria: Female subject , least 18 year age Presented symptomatic vulvovaginitis consistent diagnosis moniliasis Signed date informed consent Were pregnant , nursing , plan pregnancy within study participation period Had evidence bacterial , viral , protozoal infection Had hypersensitivity allergy imidazole , analogue , and/or Test Product ingredient Had medical condition , use medication , opinion investigator , could interfere conduct study
